alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 6:00PM CDT until September 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG AND EAST CENTRAL RANDALL COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Palo Duro Canyon, or 17 miles east of Canyon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wayside and Palo Duro Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
